biography_text: KUSTER, Ann McLane, a Representative from New Hampshire; born in Concord, Merrimack County, N.H., September 5, 1956; A.B., Dartmouth College, Hanover, N.H., 1978; J.D., Georgetown University, Washington, D.C., 1984; staff, United States Representative Paul Norton (Pete) McCloskey, Jr., of California, 1978-1981; author; lawyer, private practice; professional advocate; consultant; unsuccessful candidate for election to the One Hundred Twelfth Congress in 2010; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Thirteenth and to the two succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2013-present).
